mapper.select: SELECT UID, UPW, UNAME FROM TB1_USER WHERE UID=#{uid} and UPW=#{upw} AND usercertification=1
mapper.update: UPDATE TB1_USER SET SESSIONKEY = #{sessionId}, SESSIONLIMIT = #{next} WHERE UID = #{uid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB1_USER (UID, UPW, UNAME, UADDRESS1, UADDRESS2, UADDRESS3, UADDRESS4, UEMAIL1, UEMAIL2, UPHONE, UHOMETYPE, USTATUS) VALUES (#{uid}, #{upw}, #{uname}, #{uaddress1}, #{uaddress2}, #{uaddress3}, #{uaddress4}, #{uemail1}, #{uemail2},#{uphone}, #{uhometype}, #{ustatus})
